teachings.title: Created in His Image

scriptures.text: Let us make mankind in our image… be fruitful… have dominion.
Put on the new self… renewed in knowledge after the image of its creator.

teachings.content_md:
## Core Points
1. Identity before assignment.
2. Image reflects God's nature and authority.
3. Dominion flows from identity (Gen 1:28).
4. In Christ, the image is restored (Col 3:10).

**Declaration:** *I was created in His image. I reflect His glory. I have Dominion.*

teachings.title: Origin Words

scriptures.text: In the beginning was the Word…
By faith we understand the universe was created by the word of God…

teachings.content_md:
### Core Points
- Words birth worlds.
- Align speech with the Original Word.

**Declaration:** *My words align with His Word. I speak life and Dominion.*
